title: Why is this not allowed?

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} As OP mentioned that this post was not made in earnest and is a "troll post", I will be locking it up as per the PB sub-board guidelines:

"Additionally, threads whose sole intent is to vent, rage, or express displeasure without regard to reform or assistance (i.e., “shitposting”) will be removed per low-effort. We want this Board to be a genuine avenue of reform and guidance, not a whining ground. "

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board
Telling people that they are bad should be allowed or

> [{quoted}](name=Nadiri,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yNAWjb0e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-10T05:18:13.444+0000)
>
> Telling people that they are bad should be allowed or

Bad, yes.
Fucking trash or bronze garbage, no.
Too snowflakey if someone calls you bad only.

nah. allowing players like me to get suspended instead of chat restricting us for like 20,000 games like they did to ap0calypse at one point. tbh doesn't matter to me i'm already on another account in high gold/mid plat. I'm not really worried about a silver account. 14 days and i'll climb up again. just need to cool off. team was trolling me and lit my fuse too harshly so i posted this so people roasted me into oblivion so i'd change my attitude.

> [{quoted}](name=BannedIn40Mins,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yNAWjb0e,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-10T05:24:00.400+0000)
>
> so i'd change my attitude.

Sure...

you're right. i'm never going to change :) not really a reason to either. people on my team who go 0/9 with high mmr (playing almost a full league above their division) should be able to carry themselves to an extent. sue me if i get heated and lose my temper.

> [{quoted}](name=BannedIn40Mins,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yNAWjb0e,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-10T08:03:06.473+0000)
>
> you're right. i'm never going to change :) not really a reason to either. people on my team who go 0/9 with high mmr (playing almost a full league above their division) should be able to carry themselves to an extent. sue me if i get heated and lose my temper.

Oh gee, no wonder why you are a salty silver yasuo main.

[op.gg](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=BannedIn40Mins)
[yasuo games!](http://prntscr.com/nmxdir)

I played lots of yasuo from level 1 to level 31. tons of him tbh. I'm very fortunate he doesn't get banned and i can abuse the system that keeps him from getting banned every game. you're right. 

~~there wasn't a single yasuo game~~
"kill thy self" thats why. system probably caught it
Are you not sure why you received a punishment or are you unsure about the intensity of the punishment?
